title: How to remove recent install of Wallpapers and Ringtones
content:
Hello,

My Pixel 4a (5G) recently had some wallpapers and ringtones installed and I would like to remove them.

I do not see a way from the "Styles and Wallpapers" menu to remove the wallpaper sets.

I also cannot find a way to delete the installed ringtones from the "Sound & vibration" -> "Phone Ringtone" settings menu.

How can I delete wallpapers and ringtones?

Thanks for any assistance!
